document.full_text: in beijing, the foreign ministry said that 'technical staff of a certain enterprise' were taken hostage in a bloody 16-hour siege at a naval base in karachi, pakistan.
document.title: china admits its technicians were held in pakistan base attack
lines_and_colors: in beijing, the foreign ministry said that 'technical staff of a certain enterprise' were taken hostage in a bloody 16-hour siege at a naval base in karachi, pakistan.
